Play.PlayDescription: (10:15) 20-T.Jones right guard to NYJ 4 for 1 yard (94-T.Warren).

(9:38) 11-K.Clemens pass short left intended for 16-B.Smith INTERCEPTED by 26-E.Wilson [93-R.Seymour] at NYJ 5. 26-E.Wilson for 5 yards, TOUCHDOWN. NYJ-11-K.Clemens was injured during the play. His return is Probable. NE 26-Wilson 21st different Patriot to score a TD in season, tying NFL record (2000 Broncos and 1987 Rams) Patriots now have 510 points for the 2007 season, 8th best all-time. Patriots 66th TD of season, tied with 4 other teams for 3rd most in NFL history.

(:02) (Shotgun) 10-C.Pennington sacked at NYJ 30 for -13 yards (55-J.Seau). Patriots are now the second team in NFL history to begin a season with 14 wins. Patriots are the third team in NFL history to win 14 consecutive games in a single season. Now tied with '72 Dolphins and '04 Steelers. 3rd time in Patriots 48-year history with 14 or more wins in a regular season. 17th straight regular season win over 2 years, tying '33-34 Bears for 2nd longest streak ever to their 18-game streak 2003-04.
